product_name: SmartWool Hiker Street Socks - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The lightly cushioned men's SmartWool Hiker Street Socks are the ultimate urban trekker and weekend comfy socks. Merino wool provides excellent temperature control and moisture management; added stretch nylon maintains the fit. WOW(TM) (wool on wool) technology increases wool content in the heel and forefoot area, improving durability and overall comfort. SmartWool socks are guaranteed not to itch and can be repeatedly machine washed and dried without shrinking. Closeout.
short_description: The lightly cushioned men's SmartWool Hiker Street Socks are the ultimate urban trekker and weekend comfy socks.
